subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=2|rs=彡04}}

# [[shape]], [[form]], [[style]]

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|形声|けいせい}}: the [[phonosemantic]] formation of a [[kanji]] character from elements signifying meaning and elements signifying sound
* {{ja-r|形成|けいせい}}: [[formation]], [[shape]]
* {{ja-r|形而下|けいじか}}: [[physical]], [[material]]
* {{ja-r|形而%上|けいじ%じょう}}: [[metaphysical]]
* {{ja-r|形而%上学|けいじ%じょうがく}}: [[metaphysics]]
* {{ja-r|形容詞|けいようし}}: [[adjective]]
* {{ja-r|形容動詞|けいようどうし}}: {{qualifier|Japanese grammar}} [[adjectival]] [[noun]], ''na-'' adjective
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|形態|けいたい}}: [[shape]], [[form]]
* {{ja-r|形態学|けいたいがく}}: {{qualifier|biology}} [[morphology]]
* {{ja-r|形態論|けいたいろん}}: {{qualifier|linguistics}} [[morphology]]
* {{ja-r|形体|けいたい}}: [[physical]] [[shape]]
* {{ja-r|形相|ぎょうそう}}: a [[facial expression]], a [[look]]
* {{ja-r|形相|けいそう}}: {{qualifier|philosophy}} the [[form]], the ''[[eidos]]''; the [[Platonic]] [[ideal]]
* {{ja-r|原形質|げんけいしつ}}: [[protoplasm]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text: Probably related to {{ja-l|堅い}} / {{ja-l|硬い}} / {{ja-l|固い||katai}}, {{m|en|hard}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ka.ta/|[ka̠ta̠]}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text: Derived from ''kata'' above. {{rendaku2|sort=かた'|kata|gata}} Only found in compounds.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ɡa.ta/|[ɡa̠ta̠]|[ŋa̠ta̠]}}

subSections.title: Suffix
Usage notes
subSections.text: For a [[shape]], the spelling {{l|ja|形}} is more commonly used. For a [[type]], the spelling {{l|ja|型}} is more commonly used.

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text: Derived from {{ja-l|形木||katagi}}, itself a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=かたぎ|形|tr1=kata|t1=shape|木|tr2=ki|t2=tree, wood}}, meaning {{m|en|stencil}}. {{rendaku2|sort=かたぎ|ki|gi}}

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ka.ta.ɡi/|[ka̠ta̠ɡi]}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-l|気質}}
* {{ja-l|容気}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かたぎ}}

# [[social]] [[customs]], [[mores]]
# one's [[appearance]]; one's [[stance]] or [[body language]]
# one's [[character]], [[disposition]], [[nature]]

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|かたぎ|suffix}}

# the [[character]], [[disposition]], or [[nature]] of the affixed noun

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text: {{unk|ja|sort=かたち}}. Appears to be {{IPAchar|/kata/}} + {{IPAchar|/chi/}}, but the derivation of the {{IPAchar|/chi/}} element is unclear.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ka.ta.t͡ɕi/|[ka̠ta̠t͡ɕi]}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 5
subSections.text: From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=けい}} {{m|ltc|形|tr=heng}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|形|tr=xíng}}. The {{m|ja|漢音|sc=Latn|''kan'on''}} reading, so likely a later borrowing.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}: {{m|ja|漢音|sc=Latn|Kan'on}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/ke.e/|[ke̞ː]}}

subSections.title: Suffix
Etymology 6
subSections.text: From {{ja-l|成り||nari}}, the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||[[continuative]] form}} of the verb {{m|ja|成る|tr=naru||to become}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/na.ri/|[na̠ɽi]}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The most common spelling for this use is {{ja-l|なり}}, for all parts of speech.

subSections.title: Noun
Suffix
